Deductible_Rules.Individual_Requirement: Must be satisfied by one person's expenses
Deductible_Rules.Family_Requirement: Can be satisfied by combined eligible expenses from any covered family members
Deductible_Rules.Combination: In-network and out-of-network deductibles do not combine
Deductible_Rules.Carryover_Rule: Eligible expenses from October, November, and December count toward the next year's deductible

Out_of_Network.Individual: No out-of-pocket maximum limit. Patient continues to pay 60% coinsurance for covered services and may also be responsible for charges above the plan's allowable amount (balance billing).
Out_of_Network.Family: No out-of-pocket maximum limit. Family continues to pay 60% coinsurance for covered services and all non-covered amounts, with no upper limit or financial protection.
Out_of_Network.Patient_Responsibility: Continues to pay 40% coinsurance and any balance-billed charges indefinitely. There is no financial cap to protect the patient.

Out_of_Pocket_Maximum.Cross_Application: Covered expenses with an in-network provider do not count toward the out-of-network deductible or out-of-pocket limit (and vice versa)

Does_Not_Apply: Emergency situations if certified within 48 hours
Newborn hospital stays starting at birth

Includes: Injections performed on the same day

Out_of_Network.Lab_Xray_Injection_Exception: If performed on same day as covered $35 in-network visit, Plan pays 100% after copay

In_Network_Only.Includes: Lab work ordered by clinic and done at preferred lab

Durable_Medical_Equipment.Note: Need to add purchase price details

Enhanced_Benefit_Facilities.Condition: Only applies to services billed by approved Enhanced Benefit Facilities

Anesthesia_Services.Note: Only one anesthesia charge covered per incident

Outpatient_Surgery_And_Diagnostic.Copay_Waived: If performed at Enhanced Benefit Facility

Precertification_Requirement.Failure_To_PreCertify: May result in penalties or denial

Specialty_Pharmacy.Requirement: Some prescriptions must be filled through the designated specialty pharmacy provider

Emergency_Coverage.Non_Network_Pharmacy: Not covered except in an emergency

Coverage_Conditions.FDA_Approval: Only FDA-approved prescription drugs are covered

Employee_Eligibility.Requirement: Must meet the plan's eligibility criteria
Ineligible_Groups: Contract workers (unless specifically stated by plan sponsor)
Employee_Eligibility.Coverage_Start: After completion of any employer-specified waiting period

Eligible_Dependents: Children up to age 26 (biological, adopted, stepchildren, legal guardianship)
Disabled dependents over age 26 if continuously disabled and dependent on the employee
Termination_Conditions: Dependent no longer meets eligibility criteria
Coverage ends when employee's coverage ends
Spouse coverage ends at divorce or legal separation
Child coverage ends at age 26 unless disabled

Enrollment.Late_Enrollment: May need to wait for annual open enrollment or a special qualifying event

Eligibility.COBRA_Eligibility_Note: COBRA continuation may apply for terminated employees and dependents under certain conditions

Employee_Termination.Condition: Coverage ends when employee no longer meets plan eligibility
Employee_Termination.Effective_Date: Last day of the month in which employment ends (unless otherwise stated)

Earliest_Date_Rules: Dependent no longer meets eligibility requirements
Child no longer qualifies (e.g., turns 26 unless disabled)

Immediate_Termination_Conditions: Fraud or misrepresentation by employee or dependent

Voluntary_Termination.Reason: Voluntary drop or failure to pay contributions
Voluntary_Termination.Coverage_Ends: At the end of the paid-through period

Termination_of_Coverage.Reinstatement_Note: Termination is not a qualifying event to reinstate coverage outside of open/special enrollment
Termination_of_Coverage.COBRA_Continuation_Note: May be available as per federal law

Overview.Description: Allows eligible employees and dependents to continue health coverage after it would normally terminate
Overview.Applicability: Employer must have 20 or more employees and be subject to federal continuation laws

Qualifying_Events: Termination of employment (except for gross misconduct)
Reduction in work hours below the eligibility threshold
Dependent child no longer meeting eligibility requirements

Election_Rules.Election_Window: 60 days from date of qualifying event or receipt of COBRA notice

Coverage_Provisions.Same_As_Active_Plan: COBRA coverage is identical to active plan coverage prior to the qualifying event
Coverage_Provisions.Cost: COBRA beneficiaries pay full cost of coverage plus 2% administrative fee

Extended_Duration.Other_Events: Up to 36 months (e.g., divorce, death, loss of dependent status)

Early_Termination_Conditions: Employer stops offering group health coverage
Beneficiary becomes covered under another group plan

Covered_Services: Mental health and substance use treatment
Organ and tissue transplants (subject to guidelines)
Comprehensive_Medical_Expense_Benefit.Failure_To_Precertify: May result in benefit reduction or denial

Provider_Requirements.License: Services must be provided by a licensed provider
Provider_Requirements.Medically_Recognized: Providing services customarily recognized as medical treatment

Payment_Basis.Out_of_Network: Reasonable and customary charges (subject to balance billing)

Not_Covered_If: Not consistent with standards of care

Coordination_Of_Benefits.With_Other_Plans: May reduce payment based on other coverage (group or government)
Coordination_Of_Benefits.Primary_vs_Secondary: This plan may coordinate as secondary

Requirements: Must include all required information: itemized bills, provider info, procedure and diagnosis codes
Plan_May_Request: Additional information to process the claim

Includes: Description of additional info required (if any)

First_Level_Appeal.Deadline: Within timeframe specified by the plan (typically 180 days)
Should_Include: Reason why the claim should be paid

Second_Level_Appeal.Availability: May be available if first level appeal is denied

Payable_Only_If: Plan administrator determines all conditions for payment are met
Benefit_Conditions.Discretionary_Authority: Plan administrator has authority to interpret plan terms and determine eligibility for benefits

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Services before coverage starts
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Any treatment or service received before the individual's effective date of coverage is not payable.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: If a participant gets an X-ray on 1st Jan but their coverage starts on 10th Jan, this claim will be denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Dental services excluded
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Dental treatments are not covered unless explicitly included (e.g., in trauma cases).
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Routine cleanings, fillings, and orthodontics are excluded unless the plan states otherwise.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Cosmetic procedures
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Cosmetic surgery is not covered unless medically necessary and pre-approved by the plan.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Rhinoplasty for breathing issues may be covered if documented; cosmetic-only nose jobs are denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Vision/hearing exclusions
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Eyeglasses, exams, contact lenses, and hearing aids are excluded except when related to injury or surgery.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Eye exam for glasses = denied. Exam after eye injury = covered if medically necessary.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Work-related injuries
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: No benefits if the injury is related to employment or self-employment. These fall under workers comp.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: If incident happened outside work (e.g., gym), coverage applies.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Government facilities
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Care from VA, military, or government institutions is not payable unless for non-service disabilities as required by law.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Treatment at VA for a non-service-related issue may be covered if legally required.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: War/military exclusion
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: No coverage for any condition arising from participation in war or military action.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Civilian injured in war zone = may be covered. Soldier hurt in service = not covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: No legal payment obligation
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Services by family or discounted/free care are not covered.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: If a doctor relative provides free care, no reimbursement is allowed.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Exceeds reasonable/customary limits
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Charges above plan's allowed fee schedule will be denied or partially reimbursed.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: If a provider bills $500 but plan allows $300, the excess $200 is patient responsibility.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Self-harm or suicide
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Injuries from intentional self-harm or suicide attempts are not covered.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Attempted overdose = excluded. Mental health therapy for suicidal ideation = covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Genetic testing
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: All costs related to genetic screening are excluded unless required under federal preventive care laws.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Routine BRCA test = not covered unless preventive mandate applies.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Sterilization reversal
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Reversal of sterilization procedures (e.g., vasectomy or tubal ligation) are excluded.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Tubal reversal = denied. Initial sterilization = covered under ACA.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Non-prescribed contraceptives
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Only FDA-approved, physician-prescribed contraceptives are covered.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Plan B over-the-counter = not covered. IUD with prescription = covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Infertility treatment
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: All artificial reproductive technologies are excluded, including IVF and related medications.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Clomid for ovulation = denied. Embryo freezing = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Elective abortions
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Abortions are not covered unless there is a life-threatening condition or it's explicitly allowed.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Planned abortion = denied. Abortion due to ectopic pregnancy = possibly covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Dependent child's pregnancy
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: No coverage for pregnancy or newborn of a dependent child.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Child of a covered dependent delivering a baby = not covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Hair treatments
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Hair transplants, wigs, and baldness drugs are excluded unless specifically stated.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Wig after cancer = maybe covered. Hair loss from aging = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Nutritional counseling or supplements
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: No coverage for nutritional products, diets, or related guidance.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Ensure for malnutrition = denied unless part of inpatient care.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Health club or diet clinic membership
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Membership costs are excluded regardless of physician recommendation.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Weight Watchers membership = not covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Weight loss treatment
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: No coverage for obesity or weight-reduction programs unless required by law.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Gastric bypass = denied unless the plan includes bariatric coverage.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Hypnotherapy
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Only covered when used during a mental health treatment plan or anesthesia alternative.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Hypnosis for smoking = denied. Hypnosis before surgery = maybe covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Acupuncture
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: All acupuncture and meridian therapies are excluded.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Chiropractic = maybe covered. Acupuncture = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Biofeedback
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: All biofeedback therapy is excluded regardless of purpose.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Used for anxiety = denied. Used for migraines = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Sexual dysfunction
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Treatments for impotence or sexual inadequacy are excluded.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: ED medications like Viagra = not covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Penile implants
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Not covered regardless of medical need.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Implant for ED post-cancer = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Gender reassignment
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: All surgeries or procedures related to gender identity are excluded unless otherwise noted.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Top surgery = excluded unless specific plan includes it.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Custodial care
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Care for comfort or supervision (not active treatment) is excluded.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Long-term care facility without skilled services = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Educational confinement
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: No benefits if person is confined to an educational, rest, or aged facility.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Boarding school = excluded even if supervised.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Felony or illegal act
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: No coverage for injuries resulting from crime, riots, or illegal behavior.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Injured while robbing = denied. Injured as bystander = possibly covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Unrendered services
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Only actual services provided are reimbursed.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Claim submitted but procedure was canceled = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Experimental/investigational treatments
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Drugs or procedures not FDA-approved or outside clinical guidelines are excluded.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Unproven stem cell therapy = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Non-medical counseling
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Vocational or educational counseling is excluded unless medically necessary and listed.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Career counseling = denied. Psychiatric therapy = covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Late claim submission
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Services must be claimed within 12 months of treatment date.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Claim from 2023 submitted in 2025 = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Clergy services
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Spiritual or religious services are excluded if not charged.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Grief support from clergy = excluded.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Travel or lodging costs
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Non-medical travel, even if recommended, is not covered unless explicitly listed.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Travel to cancer center = denied unless transplant clause applies.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Unlisted services
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Only procedures specifically listed under Covered Expenses are reimbursed.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: New procedure not named in SPD = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Athletic device exclusions
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Braces or devices for sports are excluded unless medically necessary.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Knee brace for football = denied. Post-surgical brace = covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Foot care exclusions
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Conditions like corns, flat feet, and toenails are excluded except under certain disease or surgical criteria.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Toenail removal for fungus = excluded. Diabetic foot care = covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Chelation therapy
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Only covered if treating heavy metal poisoning.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: For autism = denied. For lead poisoning = covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Environmental medicine
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Any therapy classified as ecological/environmental is not covered.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Mold detoxification = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Holistic or homeopathic medicine
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: All herbal or nontraditional therapies are excluded.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Ayurveda, Chinese medicine, etc. = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Court-ordered exams
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Only covered if also deemed medically necessary.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Court-required psych eval = denied unless part of a covered diagnosis.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Comfort or personal items
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Non-clinical items like air conditioners, TVs, phones, etc. are excluded.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: TV rental during stay = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Standby physicians
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Only reimbursed if medical necessity is documented and approved.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Surgical standby without usage = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Administrative charges
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Includes missed appointments, form completion, and phone consults.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Missed appointment fees = denied.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: Smoking cessation
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Programs are excluded except for the drug Chantix.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Nicotine patches = denied. Chantix = covered.

Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Title: TMJ treatment
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Description: Not covered unless specifically listed under covered procedures.
Medical_General_Exclusions_and_Limitatio.Scenario_Logic: Bite guard for TMJ = denied unless SPD says otherwise.
